short_summary: Modular UPS Revitalization Service for SSC
description: Revitalization service for Symmetra PX UPS. RFP requires original OEM certified service providers to provide revitalization services for a Symmetra PX UPS in downtown Ottawa, Ontario. All work must be completed by May 31, 2023. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.
duration_in_months: After contract award, to complete all work
full_summary:
# Modular Uninterruptible Power Supply Revitalization Service for Shared Services Canada

## Notice of Proposed Procurement: Request for Proposal

This invitation to tender (ITT) is a re-issue of solicitation number BPM018150. Shared Services Canada (SSC) seeks the services of Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) certified service providers for the revitalization of a Modular Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) located in downtown Ottawa, Ontario.

### Solicitation Number and Tender Status

* Solicitation Number: BPM018150/22311
* Tender Status: Expired

### Documents

Required documents for this ITT can be downloaded from the following links:
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/0F6293CB-8495-4E15-AA21-2A3BD89ACFE6
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/7FCB37E6-4DBD-4BBF-928A-CC9DA80A0563
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/71466CCB-FCD6-4D9D-ACB6-5B92ABD4E1BF
